Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: ChatGPT is so much quicker than trying to ask questions in ed discussion. It has many more ideas and is more direct with its answer than teachers tend to be. Definitely saves about 3hrs per week.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI gives more confidence that what you are doing is correct.
